quizzes.title: Is This a Red Flag or Green Flag?
quizzes.hook: Most people fail this without realizing it.

questions.text: They take 6+ hours to reply but are always on social media
They remember small details you mentioned weeks ago
They only text late at night
They introduce you to their close friends
They get jealous when you mention other people
They ask about your day and actually listen
They never apologize, even when clearly wrong
They make plans in advance with you

results.title: You Need Practice üëÄ
results.description: You might be missing some obvious signs. Pay closer attention to patterns, not just words.

results.title: Getting There üéØ
results.description: You caught some flags but missed others. Trust your gut more.

results.title: Sharp Eye üî•
results.description: You can read most situations well. Keep trusting your instincts.

results.title: Flag Expert üíØ
results.description: Nothing gets past you. You see the signs others miss.

questions.text: Their texts have gotten shorter lately
They take longer to reply than before
They stopped asking questions about your life
Plans feel one-sided now
The energy feels different than before

results.title: They're Still Into You ‚ú®
results.description: Based on what you shared, things seem solid. Don't overthink it.

results.title: Minor Shifts ü§î
results.description: There might be small changes, but it's not a clear pattern yet. Keep observing.

results.title: Something's Changing üìâ
results.description: The signs suggest a shift in energy. It might be time for an honest conversation.

results.title: Trust Your Gut üíî
results.description: The patterns are there. You already sense it. Don't ignore what you're feeling.

quizzes.title: Do They Secretly Respect You?
quizzes.hook: Respect shows in actions, not words.

questions.text: When you speak, do they actually listen?
Do they keep promises they make to you?
How do they react to your boundaries?
Do they defend you when you're not around?
When you succeed, their reaction is:

results.title: Low Respect Signs üòï
results.description: Their actions suggest they may not value you as much as you deserve.

results.title: Mixed Signals ü§∑
results.description: Some respect is there, but it's inconsistent. Pay attention to patterns.

results.title: Solid Respect ‚úä
results.description: They show real respect through their actions.

results.title: Deep Respect üíé
results.description: Their respect for you is clear. This is rare - value it.

quizzes.title: Are You the Pursuer or the Prize?
quizzes.hook: Your answer reveals your relationship dynamic.

questions.text: Who usually texts first?
When plans get cancelled, who reschedules?
In conversations, who asks more questions?
Who adjusts their schedule more?

options.text: I rearrange things to see them

questions.text: After an argument, who reaches out first?

results.title: The Pursuer üèÉ
results.description: You invest more energy into the connection. Consider stepping back to see if they meet you halfway.

results.title: The Prize üëë
results.description: They're putting in more effort right now. Be careful not to take their effort for granted.

results.title: Balanced Dynamic ‚öñÔ∏è
results.description: You have a healthy push-pull. Both of you invest and both receive.

quizzes.title: How Easy Are You to Manipulate?
quizzes.hook: If you score over 60%, you already know the truth.

questions.text: Someone gives you a compliment right before asking for a favor. You:
They say 'everyone else is doing it.' You:
Someone acts hurt when you set a boundary. You:
They remind you of something they did for you before asking something big. You:

options.text: Feel obligated to return the favor

questions.text: Someone switches between being sweet and cold. You:
They say 'if you really loved me, you would...' You:

options.text: Feel like you need to prove yourself

results.title: Highly Susceptible üéØ
results.description: You tend to prioritize others' feelings over your own boundaries. Practice recognizing emotional manipulation.

results.title: Somewhat Aware üëÅÔ∏è
results.description: You notice some tactics but still get caught off guard. Learn to pause before reacting emotionally.

results.title: Hard to Fool üõ°Ô∏è
results.description: You can spot most manipulation attempts. You balance empathy with self-protection well.

results.title: Manipulation-Proof üí™
results.description: You see through tactics instantly. Very few people can influence you without your consent.

questions.text: When you're upset, people usually:

options.text: Have no idea unless I tell them

questions.text: Your face when someone annoys you:
People guess your mood correctly:
When you like someone, they:
In poker or games, you:

results.title: Open Book üìñ
results.description: Your emotions show clearly. This makes you authentic and trustworthy.

results.title: Selective Reveal üé≠
results.description: You control what people see to some degree. Good balance.

results.title: Hard to Read üîí
results.description: People struggle to figure you out. You reveal what you choose.

results.title: Mystery üåë
results.description: Almost no one can read you. You control your image completely.

quizzes.title: Do You Think Fast or Overthink?
quizzes.hook: Your decision style reveals more than you think.

options.text: I trust my gut and decide
I ask for a little more time

questions.text: After sending an important text, you:

options.text: Reread what I sent multiple times
Briefly wonder, then let it go

questions.text: When making a big purchase:

options.text: If I want it, I get it

questions.text: Someone's tone seems off in a message:
A conversation ended awkwardly. That night you:

results.title: Quick Thinker ‚ö°

results.title: Overthinker üåÄ

quizzes.title: Can You Spot Manipulation in 5 Seconds?
quizzes.hook: Most people choose the wrong answer here.

questions.text: "I'm not mad, I just think it's funny how..."
"I don't want to tell you what to do, but..."
"Hey, I noticed you seemed off today. Everything okay?"
"You're the only person who understands me"
"I'm sorry you feel that way"
"I messed up. I should have listened to you."
"After everything I've done for you..."
"I need some time to think about this"

results.title: Needs Work üò¨
results.description: You might be missing manipulation in daily conversations.

results.title: Average Awareness üëÄ
results.description: You catch some tactics but miss others.

results.title: Sharp Detector üéØ
results.description: You spot most manipulation. Your BS detector is well-calibrated.

results.title: Nothing Gets Past You ‚ö°
results.description: Perfect score. You instantly recognize manipulation tactics.

quizzes.title: How Fast Is Your Pattern Recognition?
quizzes.hook: Only 12% get all of these right.

questions.text: What comes next? 2, 4, 8, 16, __
What comes next? A, C, E, G, __
What comes next? 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, __
What comes next? 3, 6, 11, 18, 27, __
What comes next? 1, 4, 9, 16, 25, __
What comes next? Z, Y, X, W, __

results.title: Keep Practicing üìö
results.description: Pattern recognition is a skill that improves with practice.

results.title: Good Eye üëÅÔ∏è
results.description: You caught most patterns. Your logical thinking is solid.

results.title: Sharp Mind üß†
results.description: Excellent pattern recognition. You see connections quickly.

results.title: Pattern Master üèÜ
results.description: Perfect score! You have exceptional analytical abilities.

quizzes.title: Can You Avoid These Logic Traps?
quizzes.hook: Your brain will try to trick you.

questions.text: A bat and ball cost $1.10. The bat costs $1 more than the ball. How much is the ball?
If it takes 5 machines 5 minutes to make 5 widgets, how long would it take 100 machines to make 100 widgets?
In a lake, there's a patch of lily pads. Every day, the patch doubles in size. If it takes 48 days to cover the lake, how long to cover half?
A farmer has 17 sheep. All but 9 die. How many are left?
How many times can you subtract 5 from 25?

results.title: Tricked ü™§
results.description: Your brain took the shortcuts. These questions are designed to fool quick thinking.

results.title: Partially Fooled ü§î
results.description: You caught some traps but fell for others. Slow down and think twice.

results.title: Sharp Thinker üéØ
results.description: You avoided most traps. You think before you answer.

results.title: Trap-Proof üß†
results.description: Perfect! You don't fall for cognitive shortcuts.

results.title: Secure Attachment üíö

results.title: Driven by Achievement üèÜ
